Documentation for OpenTSDB 2.0

Welcome to OpenTSDB 2.0. This document is a work in progress as we strive towards a 2.0 release. Each commit that changes OpenTSDB behavior should be documented here. Once an official release is cut, this manual will be cleaned up and published.
